author: pbs.org
title: PBS NewsHour full episode October 20, 2015
text: Tuesday on the NewsHour, Canada’s Liberal Party makes a comeback. Also: How Slovenia and Greece are coping with the migrant crisis, a new study on treatment for schizophrenia, changing the guidelines for mammograms, how the oil boom brought football back to a North Dakota town, Patti Smith’s train of memories, why are women behind in science and celebrating 40 years of the NewsHour.
